items.sentence: I know that I didn\'t do what I was supposed to do.
Tom has been a close friend of mine for many years.
Tom has been going steady with Mary for six months.
Tom has been mowing our lawn for a couple of years.
Mary\'s boyfriend is three years older than she is.
I asked Tom if he knew anybody who taught swimming.
I\'m supposed to meet Tom at 2:30 at the main gate.
I\'m sure I can speak French well enough to get by.
I\'m sure Tom will try to convince Mary to do that.
Tom is one of more than 3,000 inmates on death row.
